text: Hagi Nagra hanavenentake sondia vahetamina huzmante'nuge'za vu'za rama'a vahetmina ome zamahe vagaregahaze. Hagi e'ina sondia vahe'mo'za, vahe'ma zamazeri havizama hu'za zamahe'arera vugota hu'naze. Ana hu'nazanki'za zamagra Isipi vahe'motama rantamagima eneriza zantamina eri haviza nehu'za, rama'a vahe zamahe frigahaze.
